item.title: Montreal FSA Scraping Part Dieux
item.description: Although we were able to scrape from the web the FSA we wanted, it was unfortunately not a complete list. Instead, let’s try another route using some data that’s been crowdsourced, namely the geocoder.ca dataset or a subset provided by aggdata (as the geocoder.ca table is 50mbs and I don’t need that level of accuracy).
